input.sentences: we were trying to get through the checkpoint but it was taking a long time .
there was a lot of people waiting .
after waiting all morning we eventually made it through .
output.sentences: The immigration process can be very long.
Sometimes you have to stand in line for a long time.
Security makes sure that everyone is safe and no one is carrying anything dangerous.
Once you pass security you are on your way.
And then you can get to the other side.
